Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.visitors

Classes that visit a tree of BPEL implementation objects and save or restore their state.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeImplVisitor Visitor interface specification for BPEL Implementation classes.
IAeVisitable Interface to define a visitable class.
 

Class Summary
AeBaseRestoreVisitor Convenience base class for visitors that restore state in implementation objects.
AeImplReverseTraversingVisitor A visitor that traverses a BPEL implementation object tree.
AeImplTraversingVisitor A visitor that traverses a BPEL implementation object tree.
AeInScopeVariableFindingVisitor A visitor that finds all variables in scope.
AeProcessSnapshotVisitor Visits a tree of BPEL implementation objects to collect all versions of all variables and correlation sets that are still live for normal or compensation processing.
AeRegisterLocationVisitor Visit the objects creating unique ids from process ids and their paths.
AeRestoreCompInfoVisitor Visits a tree of BPEL implementation objects to restore AeCompInfo objects from an instance of AeRestoreImplState.
AeRestoreImplStateVisitor Visits a tree of BPEL implementation objects to restore the state from an instance of AeRestoreImplState.
AeRestoreImplStateVisitor.AeDeadPathVisitor Visitor for setting the node and all of its children to dead path.
AeSaveImplStateVisitor Visit / traverse the impl to save state at each node.
AeTerminationStateUpgradeVisitor This visitor applies some changes to the process state in order to update the state of the activities to make them consistent with changes made to the termination routine.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.visitors Description

Classes that visit a tree of BPEL implementation objects and save or restore their state.
